title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not produce any result.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option should add Javadoc for the selected field in the Type Hierarchy view.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the view.
